entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
